ProductivityQuotes.quote: Focus on being productive instead of busy
ProductivityQuotes.author: Tim Ferriss

ProductivityQuotes.quote: It's not knowing what to do, it's doing what you know
ProductivityQuotes.author: Tony Robbins

ProductivityQuotes.quote: Success is often achieved by those who don't know that failure is inevitable.
ProductivityQuotes.author: Coco Chanel

ProductivityQuotes.quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
ProductivityQuotes.author: Walt Disney

ProductivityQuotes.quote: You don't have to see the whole staircase, just take the first step.
ProductivityQuotes.author: Martin Luther King

ProductivityQuotes.quote: It is not the strongest of the species that survive, nor the most intelligent, but the ones most responsive to change.
ProductivityQuotes.author: Charles Darwin

ProductivityQuotes.quote: Over the long run, the unglamorous habit of frequency fosters both productivity and creativity.
ProductivityQuotes.author: Gretchen Rubin
